snippet: Two former legislative aides sued the State House, alleging they were wrongfully fired and publicly humiliated after repeatedly reporting two lawmakers’ extramarital affair and other misconduct to Speaker Kevin Cotter’s office.
abstract: Former Michigan legislative aides Keith Allard and Ben Graham sue State House, claiming they were wrongfully terminated for exposing extramarital affair of ex-Reps Todd Courser and Cindy Gamrat to office of Speaker Kevin Cotter.
lead_paragraph: Two former legislative aides sued the State House, alleging they were wrongfully fired and publicly humiliated after repeatedly reporting two lawmakers’ extramarital affair and other misconduct to Speaker Kevin Cotter’s office.

headline.main: Michigan: House Is Sued Over Aides’ Firing
